title: 12/04/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/04/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP previews BYU against Coastal Carolina. Who would have thought this would be the game to watch this weekend? We're joined by SportsTalk 790 Houston radio host Sean Salisbury, NFL Network's NFL RedZone host Scott Hanson, and Nick Wright, co-host of FS1's First Things First. Plus, DP explains to Todd why he loves him, but he doesn't like him sometimes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
